DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether multiple dos Efavirenz effect QTc interval ( correct Fridericia ) CYP2B6 *1/*6 *6/*6 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Effect Efavirenz ECG QTcF Interval Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: CYP = Cytochrome p-450 Primary Purpose : Other : This Phase 1 clinical pharmacology thorough QT study conduct post marketing requirement
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Healthy volunteer , age 18 49 year old BMI 18 32 kg/m2 Women must pregnant breastfeed A personal history clinically relevant cardiac disease , symptomatic asymptomatic arrhythmia , presyncope syncopal episode , additional risk factor torsades de pointes ( eg , heart failure ) History hypokalemia , personal history family history prolong QT interval , family history sudden cardiac death young age Any follow 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) prior study drug administration : PR ≥210 msec , QRS ≥120 msec , QT ≥500 msec , QTcF ≥450 msec , HR < 45 bpm Second third degree heart block prior study drug Positive urine screen drug abuse Positive blood screen hepatitis C antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) 1 , 2 antibody Any follow lab result outside range specify prior dosing : Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > upper limit normal ( ULN ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > ULN , Total bilirubin > ULN , Direct bilirubin > ULN , Creatinine > ULN , Serum potassium < low limit normal ( LLN ) , Serum magnesium < LLN History allergy Moxifloxacin , Efavirenz relate compound
